text: Earle Chester Clements (October 22, 1896 â€“ March 12, 1985) was an American farmer and Democratic politician. He represented the state of Kentucky in both the U.S. House of Representatives and the U.S. Senate and was its 47th Governor from 1947 to 1950. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Governors of Kentucky Category:United States senators from Kentucky Category:United States representatives from Kentucky Category:American military personnel of World War I Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Military people from Kentucky
title: Earle Clements
